title: Musical Instruments
content: om time and use, but its strings and frets are still in excellent condition. Lute of the Merryweather Bard Common An old lute that hums with the voices of numerous sprites and spirits. Spider's Lyre Story Item The strings of this lyre are as sharp as an assassin's blade. Pluck with care, or you may lose a fingertip. Stolyarof's Table Lute Rare This heavy, deep-voiced instrument is of the type called a 'table lute' due to its weight. Famously, the late Ahndri Stolyarof refused to let anyone else
